snippet: Mr. Corella will give his farewell performance with American Ballet Theater on June 28 in the role of Prince Siegfried in Swan Lake dancing opposite Paloma Herrera.
abstract: Mr. Corella will give his farewell performance with American Ballet Theater on June 28 in the role of Prince Siegfried in Swan Lake dancing opposite Paloma Herrera.

headline.main: Ángel Corella to Leave American Ballet Theater
